alert.note: Alert for Burnet; Llano (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 25 at 11:08PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Llano and northwestern Burnet Counties through 1145 PM CDT... At 1108 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Chappel to near Tow to near Bluffton. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Buchanan Dam, Buchanan Lake Village, Lake Victor, Lone Grove, Stolz, Sunnylane, Bluffton, and Tow. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
